mapper.insert: insert into ssh_build(no, title, user_no, nickname, content) values(seq_ssh_build_no.nextval, #{title}, #{userNo}, #{nickname}, #{content})
insert into ssh_build(no, title, nickname, password, content) values(seq_ssh_build_no.nextval, #{title}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{content})
mapper.select: select no, title, nickname, content, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, view_cnt as viewCnt, recommend_cnt as recommendCnt from ssh_build order by no desc
select no, title, nickname, content, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, view_cnt as viewCnt, recommend_cnt as recommendCnt from ssh_build where title like '%#{title}%' order by no desc
